author: vbence17
title: A good minifigure for collectors
review:
I've got this magazine for a few dollars, worth it. I don't like Ninjago that much, but I really like this figure. The printed torso and legs are awesome for some mocs. I had once the dragon sword, but lost it, really good to have it back for this cheap price. The hair piece is a bit too smooth, I liked the older lego hairs better, than these new "animated movie hairs", but still a fine piece to work with.

Overall, this minifigure and the magazine are worth the money, great for those, who're collecting figures.
